{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3267850,"name":"Denis","username":"godbrigero","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/g/d6d6ee/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-12-21T07:42:14.763Z","cooked":"

Hi!

Basically, I’m making a lidar system and have a pretty accurate map. I want to render it with my custom plugin (just java render thingy).

GitHub

GitHub - lolhol/GridBoardModuleJava: A simple module for rendering Lidar data...

A simple module for rendering Lidar data on to the screen. - GitHub - lolhol/GridBoardModuleJava: A simple module for rendering Lidar data on to the screen.

The issue is that whenever i start the renderer, the simulation window freezes and nothing happens.

Thanks!
